article_title: Obamacare Will Cost 2.9 Million or More Jobs a Year

article_metadata.description: Nearly two years ago, I assured readers Obamacare would result in the equivalent of a loss of 1 million or more jobs. Little did I realize the true figure would turn out to be closer to 2.9 million.  What changed?  The non-partisan Congressional Budget Office recently reported that Obamacare will [...]
article_metadata.author: Chris Conover
